all.title: Bullet Train
all.description: Five assassins aboard a swiftly-moving bullet train find out that their missions have something in common. Unlucky assassin Ladybug (Brad Pitt) is determined to do his job peacefully after one too many gigs has gone off the rails.
all.cast: Brad Pitt, Joey King, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Ryan Reynolds

all.title: Revenge of the Sith

brad.why: Clone Wars rage across the galaxy. A sinister Sith Lord seizes control of the Republic and corrupts Anakin Skywalker to be his dark apprentice, Darth Vader. Now, in an epic lightsaber duel, Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi must confront his fallen friend.Clone Wars rage across the galaxy. A sinister Sith Lord seizes control of the Republic and corrupts Anakin Skywalker to be his dark apprentice, Darth Vader. Now, in an epic lightsaber duel, Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi must confront his fallen friend.

all.description: Clone Wars rage across the galaxy. A sinister Sith Lord seizes control of the Republic and corrupts Anakin Skywalker to be his dark apprentice, Darth Vader. Now, in an epic lightsaber duel, Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi must confront his fallen friend.
all.cast: Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman, Hayden Christensen, Ian McDiarmid, Frank Oz, Jimmy Smits

all.title: A New Hope
all.description: Young farm boy Luke Skywalker is thrust into a galaxy of adventure when he intercepts a distress call from the captive Princess Leia. The event launches him on a daring mission to rescue her from the clutches of Darth Vader and the evil Empire.
all.cast: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Peter Cushing, Alec Guinness

all.title: Avengers Endgame
all.description: The grave course of events set in motion by Thanos that wiped out half the universe and fractured the Avengers ranks compels the remaining Avengers to take one final stand in Marvel Studios' grand conclusion to twenty-two films, 'Avengers: Endgame.'
all.cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth, Scarlett Johansson, Jeremy Renner
all.genre: Science Fiction, Fantasy, Super Hero, Action-Adventure

all.title: Uncharted
all.description: Street-smart thief Nathan Drake (Tom Holland) is recruited by seasoned treasure hunter Victor “Sully” Sullivan (Mark Wahlberg) to recover a fortune lost by Ferdinand Magellan 500 years ago.
all.cast: Tom Holland, Mark Wallberg, Antonio Banderas

all.title: Fourty Seven Meters Down Uncaged
all.description: Two sisters diving in a ruined underwater city quickly learn they've entered the territory of the deadliest shark species in the claustrophobic labyrinth of submerged caves.
all.cast: Sophie Nélisse, Corinne Foxx, Brianne Tju

all.title: Gamer
all.description: In a future mind-controlling game, death row convicts are forced to battle in a 'Doom'-type environment.
all.cast: Gerard Butler, Amber Valletta, Terry Crews, Michael C Hall, Logan Lerman

all.title: Attack of the Clones
all.description: Ten years after the invasion of Naboo, the galaxy is on the brink of civil war. Under the leadership of a renegade Jedi named Count Dooku, thousands of solar systems threaten to break away from the Galactic Republic.
all.cast: Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman, Hayden Christensen, Frank Oz, Ian McDiarmid, Pernilla August

all.title: The Phantom Menace
all.description: Stranded on the desert planet Tatooine after rescuing young Queen Amidala from the impending invasion of Naboo, Jedi apprentice Obi-Wan Kenobi and his Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn discover nine-year-old Anakin
all.cast: Liam Neeson, Ewan McGregor, Natalie Portman, Jake Lloyd, Pernilla August, Frank Oz

all.title: Return of the Jedi
all.description: Epic conclusion of the saga, the Empire prepares to crush the Rebellion with a more powerful Death Star
all.cast: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams, Anthony Daniels, Peter Mayhew

all.title: Rouge One
all.description: In a time of conflict, a group of unlikely heroes band together on a mission to steal the plans to the Death Star, the Empire’s ultimate weapon of destruction.
all.cast: Felicity Jones, Diego Luna, Ben Mendelsohn, Donnie Yen, Mads Mikkelsen, Alan Tudyk

all.title: Solo
all.description: Through a series of daring escapades deep within a dark and dangerous criminal underworld, Han Solo befriends his mighty future copilot Chewbacca and meets the notorious gambler Lando Calrissian, beginning a journey that will set the course of one of the Star Wars saga’s most unlikely heroes
all.cast: Alden Ehrenreich, Woody Harrelson, Emilia Clarke, Donald Glover, Thandiwe Newton, Phoebe Waller-Bridge

all.title: The Empire Strikes back
all.description: After the destruction of the Death Star, Imperial forces continue to pursue the Rebels. After the Rebellion’s defeat on the ice planet Hoth, Luke journeys to the planet Dagobah to train with Jedi Master Yoda, who has lived in hiding since the fall of the Republic.
all.cast: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams, Anthony Daniels, David Prowse

all.title: The Force Awakens
all.description: As Kylo Ren and the sinister First Order rise from the ashes of the Empire, Luke Skywalker is missing when the galaxy needs him most.
all.cast: Harrison Ford, Mark Hamill, Carrie Fisher, Adam Driver, Daisy Ridley, John Boyega

all.title: The Last Jedi
all.description: The Force Awakens join the galactic legends in an epic adventure that unlocks new mysteries of the Force and shocking revelations of the past.
all.cast: Mark Hamill, Carrie Fisher, Adam Driver, Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Oscar Isaac

all.title: The Rise of Skywalker
all.description: Experience the riveting conclusion of the  landmark Skywalker saga, in which new legends will be born—and the final battle for freedom is yet to come.
all.cast: Carrie Fisher, Mark Hamill, Adam Driver, Daisy Ridley, John Boyega, Oscar Isaac

all.title: Oceans Eleven
all.description: Danny Ocean and his ten accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.
all.cast: George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts

all.title: Oceans Twelve
all.description: Daniel Ocean recruits one more team member so he can pull off three major European heists in this sequel to Ocean's Eleven (2001).
all.cast: George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Andy Garcia, Elliott Gould

all.title: Oceans Thirteen
all.description: Danny Ocean rounds up the boys for a third heist after casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses one of the original eleven, Reuben Tishkoff.
all.cast: George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Elliott Gould, Don Cheadle, Michael Mantell

all.title: The Curse of the Black Pearl
all.description: The roguish yet charming Captain Jack Sparrow's idyllic pirate life capsizes after his nemesis, the wily Captain Barbossa, steals his ship, the Black Pearl, and later attacks the town of Port Royal, kidnapping the governor's beautiful daughter Elizabeth.
all.cast: Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Jack Davenport, Kevin R. McNally, Zoë Saldana

all.title: Dead Mans Chest
all.description: Captain Jack Sparrow has a blood debt to pay: He owes his soul to ghastly Davy Jones unless he can cheat death -- and eternal damnation -- by seizing the fabled "Dead Man's Chest." Tremble in terror as the mighty "Kraken" roars from the ocean depths to split planks, crush hulls and snap bones!
all.cast:
Johnny Depp,
Orlando Bloom,
Keira Knightley,
Stellan Skarsgård,
Bill Nighy,
Jack Davenport

all.title: At Worlds End
all.description: Captain Jack Sparrow, that witty and wily charmer of a pirate, is trapped on a sea of sand in Davy Jones' Locker. In an increasingly shaky alliance, Will Turner, Elizabeth Swann and Captain Barbossa begin a desperate quest to find and rescue him.
all.cast:
Johnny Depp
Orlando Bloom
Keira Knightley
Stellan Skarsgård
Bill Nighy
Chow Yun-Fat
Geoffrey Rush

all.title: On Stranger Tides
all.description: A tale of truth, betrayal, youth, demise - and mermaids! When Jack crosses paths with a woman from his past, he's not sure if it's love, or if she's a ruthless con artist using him to find the fabled Fountain of Youth.
all.cast:
Johnny Depp,
Penélope Cruz,
Ian McShane,
Geoffrey Rush,
Kevin R. McNally

all.title: Dead Men Tell No Tales
all.description: Down-on-his luck Captain Jack Sparrow finds the winds of ill fortune blowing even more strongly when a crew of deadly ghost pirates led by an old rival, the terrifying Captain Salazar, escape from the Devil's Triangle, determined to kill every pirate at sea...including him.
all.cast:
Johnny Depp,
Javier Bardem,
Brenton Thwaites,
Kaya Scodelario,
Kevin R. McNally,
Golshifteh Farahani,
David Wenham,
Geoffrey Rush

all.title: An Unexpected Journey
all.description: Set in Middle Earth 60 years before the epic Lord of the Rings trilogy, the adventure follows the journey of Bilbo Baggins, who is swept into an epic quest to reclaim the lost Dwarf Kingdom from the fearsome dragon Smaug
all.cast:
Martin Freeman,
Hugo Weaving,
Elijah Wood,
Andy Serkis,
Ken Stott,
Barry Humphries,
Jed Brophy,
Mark Hadlow,
Peter Hambleton

all.title: The Desolation of Smaug
all.description: In the company of thirteen dwarves and the wizard Gandalf the Grey (Ian McKellen), Bilbo enters the Lonely Mountain in possession of Gollum's "precious" ring and his keen blade, Sting.
all.cast:
Ian McKellen,
Martin Freeman,
Richard Armitage,
Benedict Cumberbatch,
Evangeline Lilly,
Lee Pace,
Luke Evans

all.title: Battle of the Five Armys
all.description: Set in Middle-earth 60 years before the epic Lord of the Rings trilogy, the adventure follows the journey of Bilbo Baggins, who is swept into an epic quest to reclaim the lost Dwarf Kingdom from the fearsome dragon Smaug.

Graham McTavish,

all.title: The Fellowship of the Ring
all.description: The Lord of the Rings, a shy young hobbit named Frodo Baggins inherits a simple gold ring. He knows the ring has power, but not that he alone holds the secret to the survival--or enslavement--of the entire world.

all.title: The Two Towers
all.description: Frodo Baggins and Fellowship continue on their sacred quest to destroy the One Ring--but on separate paths. Their destinies lie at two towers--Orthanc Tower in Isengard, where the corrupt wizard Saruman awaits, and Sauron's fortress at Barad-dur, deep within the dark lands of Mordor.

all.title: The Return of the King
all.description: As armies mass for a final battle that will decide the fate of the world--and powerful, ancient forces of Light and Dark compete to determine the outcome--one member of the Fellowship of the Ring is revealed as the noble heir to the throne of the Kings of Men
all.cast:

all.title: Bad Boys
all.description: On a hot summer night $100 million in heroin is stolen from the Miami Police Department's evidence room. While family man Burnett is envious of Lowrey's bachelor antics, and Lowrey knows zero about being a husband
all.cast:
Martin Lawrence,
Will Smith,
Tea Leoni,

all.title: Rush Hour
all.description: When Hong Kong police detective inspector Lee's (Chan) favorite pupil is kidnapped in America, the dedicated cop and martial arts genius travels to the United States to find her.
all.cast:
Tom Wilkinson,

all.title: Rush Hour 2
all.description: While vacationing together in Hong Kong, fast-talking Los Angeles Police Department detective Carter (Tucker) and Hong Kong Police inspector Lee (Chan) investigate when a bomb explodes in the American embassy, killing two secret agents on the trail of a ring of smugglers.
all.cast:
Harris Yulin,
John Lone,
Jackie Chan,
Alan King,

all.title: Rush Hour 3
all.description: Set in Paris, Rush Hour 3 finds Tucker and Chan's misfit partners from West and East battling a wing of the Chinese organized crime family of the Triads -- with their trademark mix of great action and big laughs.

all.genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Mystery, Suspense

all.title: The Blind Side
all.description: Newcomer Quinton Aaron portrays the oversized teenager transformed from a homeless street kid to a star athlete through the kindness and charity of a dynamic woman (Bullock--Gravity) who offers him a stable home, a caring family and the opportunity to follow his dreams.
all.cast:
Sandra Bullock,
Tim McGraw,
Quinton Aaron,
Lily Collins,

all.title: The Platform
all.description: A vertical prison with one cell per level. Two people per cell. Only one food platform and two minutes per day to feed. An endless nightmare trapped in The Hole.
all.cast: Ivan Massagué, Zorion Eguileor, Antonia San Juan

all.title: I am lenged
all.description: After a biological war, Robert Neville is the last healthy human living on Earth, but he is not alone. The other humans have become vampire-like mutants, and all are hungry for Neville's blood. By day, he is the hunter, stalking the sleeping undead through the abandoned ruins of civilization.
all.cast:
Will Smith,
Alice Braga,
Charlie Tahan,
Salli Richardson,
Willow Smith

all.description: Adam Sandler plays Happy Gilmore in his journey to win his grandmas house back by picking up the unlikely sport of Golf.

all.title: Caddyshack
all.description: While caddying at a snooty country club, ambitious young Danny (Michael O'Keefe) goes for a college scholarship. But first he has to impress elitist Judge Smails (Ted Knight - Mary Tyler Moore, Too Close for Comfort) and win the big golf tournament.
all.cast:
Bill Murray,
Cindy Morgan,
